summary: A practicing architect and designer, the founder of own practice, and an experienced research and teaching critic with a demonstrated history of working in the architectural business. Skilled in rational design thinking, concept development, sustainable design, construction, urban design and landscape, and parametric design. The software skillset includes Rhino, 3ds Max, AutoCAD, Revit, Adobe Suite and SketchUp. Strong research professional with a degree focused in Architecture and Design from SUH and Budapest University of Technology.

treasury_media.title: The Hang-Out Lounge
treasury_media.description: The All-around-used lounge offers a spacious, relaxing, and comfortable furniture to get most of your potential energy out upon, offers a place for reading, sleeping, working on one's laptop, watching TV, or anything that could come to one's mind. It was inspired by the human body's curves to provide a flexible and body-shaped, comfortable surface to the user.

school.name: Budapest University of Technology and Economics

awards.title: Editor's Choice Award
awards.description: The ICH's design, (The International Community Hub in Amsterdam), has won the Editor's Choice Award by UNI for the Overseas Oasis Competition.

awards.title: Artist of Honor for 2020
awards.description:
Participated in the Exhibition Art Vision 2020 in Belgrade, Serbia. And became Artist of Honor for 2020.
Works among which have been showcased at the exhibition are: the International Community Hub in Amsterdam (ICH), Harmashatarhegyi Airfield Redevelopment in Budapest (HAR), and Visions: Paradoxicality.

awards.title: Diploma Project of The Year
awards.description: Delovan’s Diploma project was chosen as the project of the year at BME by being rated excellent and graded more than the other projects.

awards.title: Lakóépülettervezési Tanszék Competition I and II
awards.description: By proposing a new module for the future of Hungarian homes, The Magyar Rezidencia was selected as the best entry in the Lakóépülettervezési Tanszék I competition. And also the redesign of an (AirBNB Apartment) for the 2nd edition.
awards.issuer: Budapest University of Technology and Economics

awards.title: Stipendium Hungaricum Scholarship
awards.description: Was Awarded with the scholarship among other 2000 postgraduates to hold the Hungarian government scholarship to carry on master studies in Architectural Engineering at BME.

awards.title: Tamayouz Excellence Award: Iraq's Top Ten Young Architects 2016
awards.description: Delovan’s graduation project, The [B.R.C.K.], was a finalist in the tamayouz excelence award (Graduation projects category) 2016 among hundreds of other projects.

awards.title: Featured in Architecture in Creative Space magazine
awards.description: Delovan's furniture design (The Hang-Out Lounge) was featured in (Architecture in Creative Space) Magazine.

awards.title: Graduation Project of The Year
awards.description: Delovan’s graduation project was chosen as the project of the year at Salahaddin University - Hawler by being rated excellent and graded more than all the other projects.

awards.title: The University of Erbil’s Logo Design Competition
awards.description: Won a logo design competition, among hundreds of other participants, for the University of Erbil, which belongs to the international SABIS educational services.

awards.title: SUH’s language center’s cafeteria Design competition
awards.description: Won a design competition that was held in the college of engineering at Salahaddin University, to design a cafeteria for the university’s language center which would be shared with the british council, as well.

profile_positions.description: We are a group of a full in-house service that is specialized in Technologies, Engineering, Building Construction, Planning, Consultation, Project Management of large scale Architecture and Infrastructure. Sustainability is the core of our scope of work and ambitions. Our social, economic, and environmental impact started from the heart of the Kurdistan Region, expanding to multiple finished projects around the world, mainly in the EU, and the MENA.
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description: DDAD is a Budapest-, and Erbil-based professional, studio for architecture, design, urban and landscape of different scales. We work on Interiors, product design, researches and futuristic visions. We have worked on projects in the ME and EU.
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description: Assigned as the design permitting architect in the project management of the SK Battery Plant Hungary, the largest greenfield project ever to start in Hungary, in the town of Iváncsa, for the world's leading battery manufacturer, the South Korean company, SK Innovation "which is investing 2.29 billion USD, to build the company's largest European factory unit. The new facility to be constructed on 70 hectares, will make Hungary’s role in electric mobility gain great appreciation in the coming years. As the annual capacity of the production base will be 30GWh, This scale of output would supply batteries for approximately 430,000 cars based on 70 kWh per charging with a more than 400 km range, and it will also creates 2,500 new jobs. According to the company’s strategic plan, it strives to achieve 125 GWh of production capacity by 2025, a significant part of which will be provided by the capacity of the Hungarian plants." Definitely can’t wait utill it’s finished.
profile_positions.title: Project Architect

profile_positions.description:
Being the design architect in the PM of the Samsung SDI HU battery factory, the 2nd largest project in Hungary, requires solving complex problems within short time period, and great communication, collaboration and coordination skills due to the huge amount of companies and parties working on this project and its mega size. Being involved in this mega-structure project in Hungary, working amid the largest companies of Europe and South Korea, requires great coordination and time/task management. The SDI HU project also aims to facilitate green energy consumption.
It is worth mentioning that “BMW, Audi, Ford, and Volkswagen will use the batteries made in the factory. The project is a 1.2 trillion won investment” Which is around one billion USD
profile_positions.title: Project Architect

profile_positions.description: Being the Design Principal at Lucid Source is a responsibility for heading the teams executing the different design projects assigned to the department, and for delivering projects with quality and on time.
profile_positions.title: Design Principal

profile_positions.description: Working as a concept designer for the bureau's new proposals
profile_positions.title: Concept Designer

profile_positions.description: Partner at DesignStudio™, which is a creative and a dedicated team of young architects that are specialized in architectural design and visualization, interior design, landscape, and urban design projects.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
Teaching and running the design studio for the first-, second-, and fourth- year students, and also the urban design studio for the fifth year students.
Running the tasks of the department’s coordination committe, sceintific committee, and IRO committee representative.
profile_positions.title: Architecture Research and Teaching staff

profile_positions.description: Writing for the Architecture Department all the articles, website's posts, and reports, as a senior editor of the department.
profile_positions.title: Senior Architectural Editor

profile_positions.title: Intern of Architecture and Project Management

volunteer_experiences.description: Cooperated with Salahaddin University Presidency to design a new module of theaters that would be promoted in the Gulf Countries through a PhD scholar from the fine arts college in Salahaddin University.

Was a speaker and a host at ICAD, the 1st International Conference on Architecture and Interior Design, ICAD's theme was (Heritage and Sustainability) and it was co-organized by Ishik University and Salahaddin University - Erbil
Presented a seminar about Parametric Architecture entitled (Architecture through parameters)
